Data Destruction while working in the Bridgewater Malaga account\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each Bridgewater Malaga ODC member is responsible for data destruction while working in the Bridgewater Malaga account. When particular Customer data or EPAM Bridgewater Malaga account data not required anymore for service activities, such data have to be removed from local PC or laptop or from any other instance with such data. If you know that particular data not needed for your activities, but you are not sure about other Bridgewater Malaga account member, please ask your manager bout further actions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.2. Data Destruction when exiting the Bridgewater Malaga ODC\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of your last day of engagement in Bridgewater Malaga account, ODC Infrastructure support team member must delete all information from local PC or laptop unless any other action was specified by Delivery manager. After data\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"destruction\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", ODC Infrastructure support team member has to wright an email to Security Compliance officer confirming the fact of Data destruction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
